Equilibrium Raw Moments

Velocity Sets Property​

For D2Q9, D3Q15, D3Q19 and D3Q27,

∑iwi=1, ∑iwiciαciβ=cs2δαβ, ∑iwiciαciβciγciμ=cs4(δαβδγμ+δαγδβμ+δαμδβγ) ∑iwici,1ci,2⋯ci,n=0, if n is odd.\sum _{i}w_{i}=1, \\\ \sum _{i}w_{i}c_{i\alpha}c_{i\beta}=c_{s}^{2}\delta_{\alpha \beta}, \\\ \sum _{i}w_{i}c_{i\alpha}c_{i\beta}c_{i\gamma}c_{i\mu} = c_{s}^{4} (\delta_{\alpha \beta}\delta_{\gamma \mu} + \delta_{\alpha \gamma}\delta_{\beta \mu} + \delta_{\alpha \mu}\delta_{\beta \gamma}) \\\ \sum_i w_i c_{i,1} c_{i,2} \cdots c_{i,n} = 0, \space if \space n \space is \space odd.i∑​wi​=1, i∑​wi​ciα​ciβ​=cs2​δαβ​, i∑​wi​ciα​ciβ​ciγ​ciμ​=cs4​(δαβ​δγμ​+δαγ​δβμ​+δαμ​δβγ​) i∑​wi​ci,1​ci,2​⋯ci,n​=0, if n is odd.

Specially for 3D,

∑iwicix2ciy2ciz2=8172=cs4, for D3Q15, ∑iwicix2ciy2ciz2=0,for D3Q19, ∑iwicix2ciy2ciz2=81216=cs6, for D3Q27\sum_i w_i c_{ix}^2 c_{iy}^2 c_{iz}^2 = 8 \frac{1}{72} = c_s^4, \space for \space D3Q15, \\\ \sum _i w_i c_{ix}^2 c_{iy}^2 c_{iz}^2 = 0, for \space D3Q19, \\\ \sum _i w_i c_{ix}^2 c_{iy}^2 c_{iz}^2 = 8 \frac{1}{216} = c_s^6, \space for \space D3Q27i∑​wi​cix2​ciy2​ciz2​=8721​=cs4​, for D3Q15, i∑​wi​cix2​ciy2​ciz2​=0,for D3Q19, i∑​wi​cix2​ciy2​ciz2​=82161​=cs6​, for D3Q27

Properties of Discrete Hermite Polynomials​

∑wiHixxyy(4)=∑wi(cix2−cs2)(ciy2−cs2)=∑wix(cix2ciy2−cs2cix2−cs2ciy2+cs4)=0,\sum w_i H_{ixxyy}^{(4)} = \sum w_{i} (c_{ix}^2 - c_s^2)(c_{iy}^2 - c_s^2) = \sum w_{ix} (c_{ix}^2 c_{iy}^2 - c_s^2 c_{ix}^2 - c_s^2 c_{iy}^2 + c_s^4) = 0, \\∑wi​Hixxyy(4)​=∑wi​(cix2​−cs2​)(ciy2​−cs2​)=∑wix​(cix2​ciy2​−cs2​cix2​−cs2​ciy2​+cs4​)=0, ∑wiHixxyz(4)=∑wi(cix2−cs2)ciyciz=0\sum w_i H_{ixxyz}^{(4)} = \sum w_{i} (c_{ix}^2 - c_s^2) c_{iy} c_{iz} = 0∑wi​Hixxyz(4)​=∑wi​(cix2​−cs2​)ciy​ciz​=0

Thus,

∑iwiH(0)=1, ∑iwiHiα(1)=0, ∑iwiHiαβ(2)=0, ∑iwiHiαβγ(3)=0,∑iwiHiααββ(4)=∑iwiHiααβγ(4)=0, ∑wiHiααββγ(5)=0,  α,β and γ are different.∑iwiHixxyyzz(6)=∑iwi(cix2−cs2)(ciy2−cs2)(ciz2−cs2)=∑iwicix2ciy2ciz2−cs2(cs4+cs4+cs4)+cs4(cs2+cs2+cs2)−cs6=∑iwicix2ciy2ciz2−cs6={2cs6, for D3Q15−cs6, for D3Q190, for D3Q27\sum_i w_i H^{(0)} = 1, \space \sum_i w_i H_{i\alpha}^{(1)} = 0, \space \sum_i w_i H_{i \alpha \beta} ^{(2)} = 0, \space \sum_i w_i H_{i\alpha \beta \gamma}^{(3)} = 0, \\ \sum_i w_i H_{i \alpha \alpha \beta \beta}^{(4)} = \sum_i w_i H_{i \alpha \alpha \beta \gamma}^{(4)} = 0,\space \sum w_i H_{i \alpha \alpha \beta \beta \gamma} ^{(5)} = 0, \space \space \alpha, \beta \space and \space \gamma \space are \space different. \\ \sum _i w_i H_{ixxyyzz}^{(6)} = \sum _i w_i (c_{ix}^2 - c_s^2) (c_{iy}^2 - c_s^2) (c_{iz}^2 - c_s^2) = \sum _i w_i c_{ix}^2 c_{iy}^2 c_{iz}^2 - c_s^2 (c_s^4 + c_s^4 + c_s^4) + c_s^4 (c_s^2 + c_s^2 + c_s^2) - c_s^6 \\ = \sum _i w_i c_{ix}^2 c_{iy}^2 c_{iz}^2 - c_s^6 = \begin{cases} 2 c_s^6, \space for \space D3Q15 \\ - c_s^6, \space for \space D3Q19 \\ 0, \space for \space D3Q27 \end{cases}i∑​wi​H(0)=1, i∑​wi​Hiα(1)​=0, i∑​wi​Hiαβ(2)​=0, i∑​wi​Hiαβγ(3)​=0,i∑​wi​Hiααββ(4)​=i∑​wi​Hiααβγ(4)​=0, ∑wi​Hiααββγ(5)​=0,  α,β and γ are different.i∑​wi​Hixxyyzz(6)​=i∑​wi​(cix2​−cs2​)(ciy2​−cs2​)(ciz2​−cs2​)=i∑​wi​cix2​ciy2​ciz2​−cs2​(cs4​+cs4​+cs4​)+cs4​(cs2​+cs2​+cs2​)−cs6​=i∑​wi​cix2​ciy2​ciz2​−cs6​=⎩⎨⎧​2cs6​, for D3Q15−cs6​, for D3Q190, for D3Q27​

Multiplied by ciαc_{i \alpha}ciα​,

∑iwiH(0)ciα=0, ∑iwiHiα(1)ciβ=cs2δαβ, ∑iwiHiαβ(2)ciγ=0, ∑iwiHiαβγ(3)ciμ=0,∑iwiHiααββ(4)ciγ=∑iwiHiααβγ(4)ciμ=0,∑iwiHixxyyzz(6)ciα=0,∑wiHiααββγ(5)ciμ={∑iwicix2ciy2ciz2−cs6, if ααββγμ is permutation of xxyyzz,0, otherwise\sum_i w_i H^{(0)} c_{i\alpha} = 0,\space \sum_i w_i H_{i\alpha}^{(1)} c_{i\beta}= c_s^2 \delta_{\alpha \beta}, \space \sum_i w_i H_{i \alpha \beta} ^{(2)} c_{i\gamma} = 0, \space \sum_i w_i H_{i\alpha \beta \gamma}^{(3)} c_{i\mu}= 0, \\ \sum_i w_i H_{i \alpha \alpha \beta \beta}^{(4)} c_{i\gamma} = \sum_i w_i H_{i \alpha \alpha \beta \gamma}^{(4)} c_{i \mu}= 0, \sum _i w_i H_{ixxyyzz}^{(6)} c_{i \alpha} = 0,\\ \sum w_i H_{i \alpha \alpha \beta \beta \gamma} ^{(5)} c_{i \mu} = \begin{cases} \sum_i w_i c_{ix}^2 c_{iy}^2 c_{iz}^2 - c_s^6, \space if \space \alpha\alpha\beta\beta\gamma\mu \space is \space permutation \space of \space xxyyzz, \\ 0, \space otherwise \end{cases}i∑​wi​H(0)ciα​=0, i∑​wi​Hiα(1)​ciβ​=cs2​δαβ​, i∑​wi​Hiαβ(2)​ciγ​=0, i∑​wi​Hiαβγ(3)​ciμ​=0,i∑​wi​Hiααββ(4)​ciγ​=i∑​wi​Hiααβγ(4)​ciμ​=0,i∑​wi​Hixxyyzz(6)​ciα​=0,∑wi​Hiααββγ(5)​ciμ​={∑i​wi​cix2​ciy2​ciz2​−cs6​, if ααββγμ is permutation of xxyyzz,0, otherwise​

Multiplied by ciαciβciγc_{i \alpha} c_{i \beta} c_{i \gamma}ciα​ciβ​ciγ​,

∑iwiH(0)ciαciβciγ=0, ∑iwiHiα(1)ciβciγciμ=cs4(δαβδγμ+δαγδβμ+δαμδβγ), ∑iwiHiαβ(2)ciγciμciν=0,∑iwiHiαβγ(3)ciμciνciξ=∑iwiciαciβciγciμciνciξ−δαβcs6(δγμδνξ+δγνδμξ+δγξδμν), α≠γ,∑iwiHiααββ(4)ciγciμciν=0, ∑iwiHiααβγ(4)ciμciνciξ=0,∑wiHiααββγ(5)ciμciνciξ={0, if μνξ is pertumation of xyz.0, if μνξ has 0 or 2 order of γ,(1−cs2)(∑iwicix2ciy2ciz2−cs6), otherwise∑iwiHixxyyzz(6)ciαciβciγ=0,\sum_i w_i H^{(0)} c_{i\alpha} c_{i \beta} c_{i \gamma} = 0,\space \sum_i w_i H_{i\alpha}^{(1)} c_{i\beta} c_{i \gamma} c_{i \mu} = c_{s}^{4}(\delta_{\alpha \beta}\delta_{\gamma \mu} + \delta_{\alpha \gamma}\delta_{\beta \mu} + \delta_{\alpha \mu}\delta_{\beta \gamma}), \space \sum_i w_i H_{i \alpha \beta} ^{(2)} c_{i\gamma} c_{i\mu} c_{i \nu} = 0, \\ \sum_i w_i H_{i\alpha \beta \gamma}^{(3)} c_{i\mu} c_{i\nu} c_{i \xi} = \sum_i w_i c_{i\alpha} c_{i\beta} c_{i\gamma} c_{i\mu} c_{i\nu} c_{i\xi} - \delta_{\alpha \beta} c_s^6 (\delta _{\gamma \mu} \delta_{\nu \xi} + \delta_{\gamma \nu}\delta_{\mu \xi} + \delta_{\gamma \xi}\delta_{\mu \nu}), \space \alpha \neq \gamma ,\\ \sum_i w_i H_{i \alpha \alpha \beta \beta}^{(4)} c_{i\gamma} c_{i\mu} c_{i\nu} = 0, \space \sum_i w_i H_{i \alpha \alpha \beta \gamma}^{(4)} c_{i \mu} c_{i\nu} c_{i \xi}= 0, \\ \sum w_i H_{i \alpha \alpha \beta \beta \gamma} ^{(5)} c_{i \mu} c_{i\nu} c_{i \xi}= \begin{cases} 0, \space if \space \mu \nu \xi \space is \space pertumation \space of \space xyz. \\ 0, \space if \space \mu \nu \xi \space has \space 0 \space or \space 2 \space order \space of \space \gamma, \\ (1-c_s^2)(\sum_i w_i c_{ix}^2 c_{iy}^2 c_{iz}^2 - c_s^6), \space otherwise \end{cases} \\ \sum _i w_i H_{ixxyyzz}^{(6)} c_{i\alpha} c_{i \beta} c_{i \gamma}= 0,i∑​wi​H(0)ciα​ciβ​ciγ​=0, i∑​wi​Hiα(1)​ciβ​ciγ​ciμ​=cs4​(δαβ​δγμ​+δαγ​δβμ​+δαμ​δβγ​), i∑​wi​Hiαβ(2)​ciγ​ciμ​ciν​=0,i∑​wi​Hiαβγ(3)​ciμ​ciν​ciξ​=i∑​wi​ciα​ciβ​ciγ​ciμ​ciν​ciξ​−δαβ​cs6​(δγμ​δνξ​+δγν​δμξ​+δγξ​δμν​), α=γ,i∑​wi​Hiααββ(4)​ciγ​ciμ​ciν​=0, i∑​wi​Hiααβγ(4)​ciμ​ciν​ciξ​=0,∑wi​Hiααββγ(5)​ciμ​ciν​ciξ​=⎩⎨⎧​0, if μνξ is pertumation of xyz.0, if μνξ has 0 or 2 order of γ,(1−cs2​)(∑i​wi​cix2​ciy2​ciz2​−cs6​), otherwise​i∑​wi​Hixxyyzz(6)​ciα​ciβ​ciγ​=0,

Standard Equilibrium Form (Truncated up to the second order)​

Standard form is:

fieq=wiρ{1+ci⋅ucs2+12cs4[Hixx(2)ux2+Hiyy(2)uy2+2Hixy(2)uxuy]}, for 2D,fieq=wiρ{1+ci⋅ucs2+12cs4[Hixx(2)ux2+Hiyy(2)uy2+Hizz(2)uz2+2(Hixy(2)uxuy+Hixz(2)uxuz+Hiyz(2)uyuz)]}, for 3Df_i^{eq} = w_i \rho \{ 1 + \frac{\bold{c_i} \cdot \bold{u}}{c_s^2} + \frac{1}{2 c_s^4}[H_{ixx}^{(2)}u_x^2 + H_{iyy}^{(2)}u_y^2 + 2H_{ixy}^{(2)} u_x u_y] \}, \space for \space 2D, \\ f_{i}^{eq}=w_{i}\rho\{1 + \frac{\mathbf{c_{i} \cdot \mathbf{u}}}{c_{s}^{2}} + \frac{1}{2c_{s}^{4}}[H_{ixx}^{(2)}u_{x}^{2}+H_{iyy}^{(2)}u_{y}^{2}+H_{izz}^{(2)}u_{z}^{2} + 2(H_{ixy}^{(2)}u_{x}u_{y}+H_{ixz}^{(2)}u_{x}u_{z} + H_{iyz}^{(2)}u_{y}u_{z})] \}, \space for \space 3Dfieq​=wi​ρ{1+cs2​ci​⋅u​+2cs4​1​[Hixx(2)​ux2​+Hiyy(2)​uy2​+2Hixy(2)​ux​uy​]}, for 2D,fieq​=wi​ρ{1+cs2​ci​⋅u​+2cs4​1​[Hixx(2)​ux2​+Hiyy(2)​uy2​+Hizz(2)​uz2​+2(Hixy(2)​ux​uy​+Hixz(2)​ux​uz​+Hiyz(2)​uy​uz​)]}, for 3D

The followings can be reached,

Πeq=∑ifieq=ρΠαeq=∑ifieqciα=ρuαΠαβeq=∑ifieqciαciβ=ρcs2δαβ+ρuαuβΠαβγeq=∑ifieqciαciβciγ=ρcs2(uαδβγ+uβδαγ+uγδαβ)\Pi^{eq}=\sum _{i}f_{i}^{eq}=\rho \\ \Pi_{\alpha}^{eq}=\sum _{i}f_{i}^{eq}c_{i\alpha}=\rho u_{\alpha} \\ \Pi_{\alpha \beta}^{eq}=\sum _{i}f_{i}^{eq}c_{i\alpha}c_{i\beta}=\rho c_{s}^{2}\delta_{\alpha \beta}+\rho u_{\alpha}u_{\beta} \\ \Pi_{\alpha \beta \gamma}^{eq} = \sum _{i}f_{i}^{eq}c_{i\alpha}c_{i\beta}c_{i\gamma}=\rho c_{s}^{2}(u_{\alpha}\delta_{\beta \gamma} + u_{\beta}\delta_{\alpha \gamma} + u_{\gamma}\delta_{\alpha \beta})Πeq=i∑​fieq​=ρΠαeq​=i∑​fieq​ciα​=ρuα​Παβeq​=i∑​fieq​ciα​ciβ​=ρcs2​δαβ​+ρuα​uβ​Παβγeq​=i∑​fieq​ciα​ciβ​ciγ​=ρcs2​(uα​δβγ​+uβ​δαγ​+uγ​δαβ​)

Fourth Moments (2D Case)​

Πααββeq\Pi_{\alpha\alpha\beta\beta}^{eq}Πααββeq​:

Πxxyyeq=ρ∑iwi{1+1cs2[Hix(1)ux+Hiy(1)uy]+12cs4[Hixx(2)ux2+Hiyy(2)uy2+2Hixy(2)uxuy]}cix2ciy2=ρcs4+ρ2cs4(cs4ux2−cs6ux2+cs4uy2−cs6uy2+0)=ρcs4+ρ2(ux2−cs2+uy2−cs2)=ρcs4+0.5ρ(1−cs2)(ux2+uy2)\Pi_{xxyy}^{eq} = \rho \sum_i w_i \{1 + \frac{1}{c_s^2} [H_{ix}^{(1)} u_x + H_{iy}^{(1)} u_y] + \frac{1}{2 c_s^4}[H_{ixx}^{(2)}u_x^2 + H_{iyy}^{(2)}u_y^2 + 2H_{ixy}^{(2)} u_x u_y]\} c_{ix}^2 c_{iy}^2 \\ = \rho c_s^4+ \frac{\rho}{2 c_s^4} (c_s^4 u_x^2 - c_s^6 u_x^2 + c_s^4 u_y^2 - c_s^6 u_y^2 + 0) \\ = \rho c_s^4 + \frac{\rho}{2}(u_x^2 -c_s^2 + u_y^2 - c_s^2) = \rho c_s^4 + 0.5\rho (1-c_s^2)(u_x^2 + u_y^2)Πxxyyeq​=ρi∑​wi​{1+cs2​1​[Hix(1)​ux​+Hiy(1)​uy​]+2cs4​1​[Hixx(2)​ux2​+Hiyy(2)​uy2​+2Hixy(2)​ux​uy​]}cix2​ciy2​=ρcs4​+2cs4​ρ​(cs4​ux2​−cs6​ux2​+cs4​uy2​−cs6​uy2​+0)=ρcs4​+2ρ​(ux2​−cs2​+uy2​−cs2​)=ρcs4​+0.5ρ(1−cs2​)(ux2​+uy2​)

Fourth Moments (3D Case)​

Παβγμeq\Pi_{\alpha \beta \gamma \mu}^{eq}Παβγμeq​ is complicated:

For Παααβeq\Pi_{\alpha \alpha \alpha \beta}^{eq}Παααβeq​ ：(β\betaβ can be equal to α\alphaα)

Παααβeq=Παβeq\Pi_{\alpha \alpha \alpha \beta}^{eq} = \Pi_{\alpha \beta}^{eq}Παααβeq​=Παβeq​

For Πααβγeq\Pi_{\alpha \alpha \beta \gamma}^{eq}Πααβγeq​ ：(α≠β,α≠γ,β≠γ\alpha \ne \beta, \alpha \ne \gamma, \beta \ne \gammaα=β,α=γ,β=γ)

Πααβγeq=ρ∑iwi{1+1cs2(Hix(1)ux+Hiy(1)uy+Hiz(1)uz)+12cs4[Hixx(2)ux2+Hiyy(2)uy2+Hizz(2)uz2+2(Hixy(2)uxuy+Hiyz(2)uyuz+Hixz(2)uxuz)]}ciα2ciβciγ=ρ{∑iwiciα2ciβciγ+1cs2(0+0+0)+12cs4(0+0+0+uβuγ∑iwi2Hiβγ(2)ciα2ciβciγ)}=ρuβuγcs4∑iwicix2ciy2ciz2\Pi_{\alpha \alpha \beta \gamma}^{eq} = \\ \rho \sum_i w_i \{ 1 + \frac{1}{c_s^2} (H_{ix}^{(1)} u_x + H_{iy}^{(1)} u_y + H_{iz}^{(1)} u_z) + \frac{1}{2 c_s^4}[H_{ixx}^{(2)} u_x^2 + H_{iyy}^{(2)} u_y^2 + H_{izz}^{(2)} u_z^2 + 2 (H_{ixy}^{(2)} u_x u_y + H_{iyz}^{(2)} u_y u_z + H_{ixz}^{(2)} u_x u_z)]\} c_{i\alpha }^2 c_{i\beta } c_{i\gamma}\\ = \rho \{\sum_i w_i c_{i\alpha}^2 c_{i\beta} c_{i\gamma} + \frac{1}{c_s^2}(0 + 0 + 0) + \frac{1}{2 c_s^4}(0 + 0 + 0 + u_{\beta} u_{\gamma}\sum_i w_i 2 H_{i \beta \gamma}^{(2)} c_{i\alpha}^2 c_{i\beta} c_{i\gamma}) \} \\ = \frac{\rho u_{\beta} u_{\gamma}}{c_s^4} \sum_i w_i c_{ix}^2 c_{iy}^2 c_{iz}^2Πααβγeq​=ρi∑​wi​{1+cs2​1​(Hix(1)​ux​+Hiy(1)​uy​+Hiz(1)​uz​)+2cs4​1​[Hixx(2)​ux2​+Hiyy(2)​uy2​+Hizz(2)​uz2​+2(Hixy(2)​ux​uy​+Hiyz(2)​uy​uz​+Hixz(2)​ux​uz​)]}ciα2​ciβ​ciγ​=ρ{i∑​wi​ciα2​ciβ​ciγ​+cs2​1​(0+0+0)+2cs4​1​(0+0+0+uβ​uγ​i∑​wi​2Hiβγ(2)​ciα2​ciβ​ciγ​)}=cs4​ρuβ​uγ​​i∑​wi​cix2​ciy2​ciz2​

For Πααββeq\Pi_{\alpha \alpha \beta \beta}^{eq}Πααββeq​ ：(α≠β\alpha \ne \betaα=β)

Πααββeq=ρ∑iwi{1+1cs2(Hix(1)ux+Hiy(1)uy+Hiz(1)uz)+12cs4[Hixx(2)ux2+Hiyy(2)uy2+Hizz(2)uz2+2(Hixy(2)uxuy+Hiyz(2)uyuz+Hixz(2)uxuz)]}ciα2ciβ2=ρ(∑iwiciα2ciβ2+1cs2(0+0+0)+12cs4∑iwi(ciα4ciβ2uα2−cs2ciα2ciβ2uα2+ciα2ciβ4uβ2−cs2ciα2ciβ2uβ2+cix2ciy2ciz2uγ2−cs2ciα2ciβ2uγ2+0+0+0))=ρ(cs4+12cs4(cs4uα2+cs4uβ2)+12cs4∑iwicix2ciy2ciz2uγ2−12cs2(ux2+uy2+uz2)∑iwiciα2ciβ2)=ρcs4(1−u⋅u2cs2)+ρ2(uα2+uβ2)+ρuγ22cs4∑iwicix2ciy2ciz2\Pi_{\alpha \alpha \beta \beta}^{eq} = \rho \sum_i w_i \{ 1 + \frac{1}{c_s^2} (H_{ix}^{(1)} u_x + H_{iy}^{(1)} u_y + H_{iz}^{(1)} u_z) + \frac{1}{2 c_s^4}[H_{ixx}^{(2)} u_x^2 + H_{iyy}^{(2)} u_y^2 + H_{izz}^{(2)} u_z^2 + 2 (H_{ixy}^{(2)} u_x u_y + H_{iyz}^{(2)} u_y u_z + H_{ixz}^{(2)} u_x u_z)]\} c_{i\alpha }^2 c_{i\beta}^2 \\ = \rho (\sum_i w_i c_{i\alpha }^2 c_{i\beta}^2 + \frac{1}{c_s^2}(0 + 0 + 0) + \frac{1}{2 c_s^4} \sum_i w_i (c_{i \alpha}^4 c_{i \beta}^2 u_{\alpha}^2 - c_s^2 c_{i \alpha}^2 c_{i \beta}^2 u_{\alpha}^2 + c_{i \alpha}^2 c_{i \beta}^4 u_{\beta}^2 - c_s^2 c_{i \alpha}^2 c_{i \beta}^2 u_{\beta}^2 + c_{ix}^2 c_{iy}^2 c_{iz}^2 u_{\gamma}^2 - c_s^2 c_{i \alpha}^2 c_{i \beta}^2 u_{\gamma}^2 + 0 + 0 + 0)) \\ = \rho (c_s^4 + \frac{1}{2c_s^4} (c_s^4 u_{\alpha}^2 + c_s^4 u_{\beta}^2) + \frac{1}{2c_s^4} \sum_i w_i c_{ix}^2 c_{iy}^2 c_{iz}^2 u_{\gamma}^2 -
